page.title: 09HOUSING
page.content: On the 20th July out of 15 houses available in Brookmans Park 13 were priced at over Â£100,000 the other two were below this figure. In nearby Welham Green ten houses were for sale 9 of which were below Â£100,000 and only two above. House prices between the two villages vary from Â£175,000 in Brookmans Park to Â£43,000 in Welham Green. Any new housing which is taking place in the aea is occurring in Welham Green. With 5 houses out of 15 above Â£150,000 in Brookmans Park this village is well above the average for the London area where a three bedroomed house sells for Â£50,000 to Â£60,000.This is not surprising for Brookmans Park is in highly desirable commuterland with large individual houses available.
